org.apache.flink.api.common

Interface Program

  • All Superinterfaces:
    Serializable
    All Known Implementing Classes:
    JDBCExample, WordCount, WordCountWithOutputFormat

    public interface Program
extends Serializable
    A Program represents and end-to-end Flink program. The Program creates the Plan, which describes the data flow to be executed.

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      Plan getPlan(String... args)
      The method which is invoked by the compiler to get the job that is then compiled into an executable schedule.

    • Method Detail

      • getPlan

        Plan getPlan(String... args)
        The method which is invoked by the compiler to get the job that is then compiled into an executable schedule.
        Parameters:
        args - The array of input parameters. The parameters may be taken from the command line.
        Returns:
        The job to be compiled and executed.
